thread.title: SUSE Announces SUSECon 2015 Keynotes and Sponsors -- NUREMB
thread.title_full: SUSE Announces SUSECon 2015 Keynotes and Sponsors -- NUREMB

author: SUSE LLC
title: SUSE Announces SUSECon 2015 Keynotes and Sponsors -- NUREMB
text:
NUREMBERG , Germany , Oct. 15,   SUSE® today announced keynote and sponsor details for its upcoming SUSECon 2015 global technical conference being held Nov. 2-6 in Amsterdam . SUSE's annual end-user conference will showcase the latest innovations in open source and Linux technologies, including big data, software-defined storage, cloud computing, zero downtime, data center standardization, Docker and containers, and SAP on Linux. "With 124 deep-dive technology sessions to choose from, 20 expert-led demo stations, and keynotes from industry leaders Fujitsu, IBM and SAP, SUSECon provides a wealth of opportunities for attendees to learn how to improve their businesses through technology," said Michael Miller , SUSE vice president of global alliances and marketing. "Come to SUSECon and meet with SUSE engineers, dozens of industry-leading exhibitors and, most important, other users and partners. The sense of community and the quality of technical content makes SUSECon an unparalleled experience. That's our goal, and attendees will see the benefits."
Keynote speakers include Chiseki Sagawa, Fujitsu senior vice president, Service Platform Strategy and Planning Office; Ross Mauri , general manager, IBM z Systems; Jürgen Kreuziger, SAP SE senior vice president, Cloud and Lifecycle Management; Nils Brauckmann , president and general manager of SUSE; and Miller.
SUSECon 2015 sponsors include Fujitsu, IBM and SAP as cornerstone sponsors, with platinum sponsors HP and Intel and gold sponsors Cisco, Dell, Micro Focus, Microsoft Azure, Tata Consultancy Services and VMware.
At SUSECon, attendees will learn how to use open source technologies to bring innovation to the data center that helps control IT infrastructure and optimize IT resources. For more information about SUSECon, including registration, sponsors and session details, visit www.susecon.com .
About SUSE
SUSE, a pioneer in open source software, provides reliable, interoperable Linux, cloud infrastructure and storage solutions that give enterprises greater control and flexibility. More than 20 years of engineering excellence, exceptional service and an unrivaled partner ecosystem power the products and support that help our customers manage complexity, reduce cost, and confidently deliver mission-critical services. The lasting relationships we build allow us to adapt and deliver the smarter innovation they need to succeed – today and tomorrow. For more information, visit www.suse.com .
